title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of $$m+3$$ and $$m+4$$ is $$\left(m+3\right) \left(m+4\right)$$

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{4\left(m+4\right)}{\left(m+3\right) \left(m+4\right)}+\frac{3\left(m+3\right)}{\left(m+3\right) \left(m+4\right)}$$
